p.italic: But I don’t think they are going to understand the degree to which the data generated has the potential, some day as technology progresses, ... to take away some of the autonomy. At the same time the data are powerful that maybe is the thing that informs us to be able to make the vaccine, which everyone would like to see happen successfully. And we can’t know all the risks of anything that we do. And so I think there is a difficult tension between benefits and risk. (#12)
